title: hyrum202
author: hyrum202
content: Event Name: **EC2 Mac POC credit - GF AMER part1**Credit amount: $1000This event came out September 2022**Applicable only on EC2****Expiration Date: 12-31-2025****You can only use this code one time per account **Please double check that you have not used this event name before on your AWS acc.PRICE - $150TERMS OF SALEYou must have a verified AWS account in order to use AWS promotional credits.Read AWS Promotional Credit Terms & Conditions on the same page before you redeem- https://aws.amazon.com/awscredits/To redeem your credits visit. https://aws.amazon.com/awscredits/I'm not responsible if your AWS account(s) are flagged or the credit is revoked, AWS has the right to cancel/revoke any type of promotional credit. (cant stress this enough, please read their TOS)This is a digital product, all orders are final, no refunds are accepted. By purchasing this product, the buyer knowingly agrees to these terms and acknowledges any attempt to dispute or refute these charge(s) is a deliberate act of fraud.Message me if u have any issuesCONTACT ON SKYPElive:.cid.9817f02137e33c1bEMAIL: Hyrumadams223@outlook.com
